name: Cyber NINJA that Climbs the City
name_original: Cyber NINJA that Climbs the City
description:
New action game, created with Unreal Engine 5!

Climb

The city is already corrupted.
Climb the skyscrapers of Tokyo and fend off the assassins of the Metropolitan Police Department.
Rescue the precious Grand Lady waiting for you at the top of the Radio Tower and dismantle the hostile corporate coalition.

■Cyberpunk city.
■Play through the simple game of three stages at once.
■The stage composition changes with each challenge.



■Use the physics to master the maneuvers and climb higher!



■Use hook shots to move and guns and swords to attack.
■Aerial battles with Tokyo cops.



■Never give up, no matter how many times you fall!
